forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early then scattered thunderstorms developing late. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with scattered thunderstorms arriving overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the evening...overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers during the evening will give way to a steadier rain overnight. Low around 50F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. ESE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. ESE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
